description.title: Gateway: two registered users with a single subscription (subscribe all logs)
description.purpose:
In the test we have a user that deploys and transacts against the Storage contract through the primary gateway and it's own connection. Another connection is created with two registered users, and a single subscription is made to all event logs from the network. Since the Storage Store event is a lifecycle event, and we subscribe to all event logs from the network, we expect a single call back for our subscriber (de-duplication).
Skipped due to https://github.com/ten-protocol/ten-internal/issues/4297
